page.title: 13HOUSING IN HARWORTH
page.content: We did a survey to find out about the numbers of people living in each house and also about the different types of houses in our village.Most people lived in families of four or five people.17 of the children(30%) had four people in their house and 16 (28%) had five people.Just three children(5%) lived with only two people in their house whilst at the other end of the scale 1 child had 8 people living at his house. Most children(58%) lived im semi detached houses whilst 19% lived in terraced houses.A few children lived in caravans at the Plumtree caravan site and a few lived in detached houses.Most people liked living in our village.Of the children we asked 39 said they did and 13 said they did not.
